metadata.title: craftshou 2 Pcs Gua Sha Massage Tool Set,Guasha Facial Tools for Face Black Natural Stone Guasha Stone and Silver Stainless Steel Gua Sha Tool
features: Gua Sha Tool Set:You will receive 1 pcs black natural stone Guasha stone,1 pcs silver stainless steel gua sha tool and a red flannel bag.The black GuaSha tool is 9.5x6.5cm(3.74x2.55 inch),and the silver Gua Sha tool is 8x6cm(3.14x2.36 inch).It is a practical tool for beauty massage and SPA care.

Quality Material: The black Guasha stone is made of natural quality stone,which is natural and safe,does not contain any chemical coating.The silver Gua Sha tool is made of quality stainless steel.The surface is polished, smooth and comfortable,and more durable than tools made of stone.

How To Use: Put the smooth edge close to the skin surface,use moderate pressure to move down the muscle or along the path of the meridian,this encourages the movements of lymph,and fluids your skin will brighten,tone,and be more vital.Use essential oils or assist in some massage therapy,the effect will be better.Note:when using black gua sha stones, please use smooth edges against your skin,so as not to cause damage to your skin.
Cute Design:The heart-shaped design looks very cute, light weight and small, easy to carry, and can be used for relaxing massage at any time. This is a small massager necessary for travel.

Perfect Gift: This Gua Sha tool is suitable for everyone.It can not only beautify the face and improve the skin,but also can be used on the whole body to improve blood circulation.Specially designed for men and women, for anti-wrinkle, anti-aging facelift, method and beauty self-care.
